metadata.name: Sink
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink
metadata.description:
Sink

Used to export log entries outside Cloud Logging.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging
sink = logging.sink "severe_errors"

metadata.name: name
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink#name
metadata.description: The client-assigned sink identifier. Sink identifiers are limited to 1000 characters and can include only the following characters: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, and the special characters _-..

metadata.name: destination
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink#destination
metadata.description: The export destination. See Exporting Logs With Sinks.

metadata.name: destination=
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink#destination=
metadata.description: Updates the export destination. See Exporting Logs With Sinks.

metadata.name: filter
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink#filter
metadata.description: An advanced logs filter that defines the log entries to be exported. The filter must be consistent with the log entry format designed by the version parameter, regardless of the format of the log entry that was originally written to Cloud Logging.

metadata.name: filter=
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink#filter=
metadata.description: Updates the advanced logs filter that defines the log entries to be exported. The filter must be consistent with the log entry format designed by the version parameter, regardless of the format of the log entry that was originally written to Cloud Logging.

metadata.name: version
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink#version
metadata.description: The log entry version used when exporting log entries from this sink. This version does not have to correspond to the version of the log entry when it was written to Cloud Logging.

metadata.name: version=
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink#version=
metadata.description: Updates the log entry version used when exporting log entries from this sink. This version does not have to correspond to the version of the log entry when it was written to Cloud Logging. Accepted values are :VERSION_FORMAT_UNSPECIFIED, :V2, and :V1.

metadata.name: unspecified?
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink#unspecified?
metadata.description: Helper to determine if the sink’s version is VERSION_FORMAT_UNSPECIFIED.

metadata.name: v2?
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink#v2?
metadata.description: Helper to determine if the sink’s version is V2.

metadata.name: v1?
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink#v1?
metadata.description: Helper to determine if the sink’s version is V1.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging
sink = logging.sink "severe_errors"
sink.filter = "logName:syslog AND severity>=ERROR"
sink.save

metadata.name: reload!
title: Gcloud
Logging
Sink#reload!
metadata.description: Reloads the logs-based sink with current data from the Logging service.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
logging = gcloud.logging
sink = logging.sink "severe_errors"
sink.delete

returns.description: Returns true if the sink was deleted.
